question: In a circular linked list organization,insertion of a record involves modification of :
Linked List are not suitable data structure of which one of the following problems?

optionA: The list is empty or exactly has one element
optionB: The element in the list is sorted in non-decreasing order of data value
optionC: The element in the list are sorted in non-increasing order of data value
optionD: Not all element in the list have the same data value
correctAnswer: The element in the list is sorted in non-decreasing order of data value
